add_tips: Select date before today add a countup counter, select date after today add a countdown counter. Description can be added after added the countdate.
click_on_title_or_date_to_edit: Click on title or date to edit

tour.step_1: How to add new event: Add a new Countdate
tour.step_3: Choose event date (either before or after today)
tour.step_5: How to edit events: Click on edit button
tour.step_6: Click on title or date to edit
tour.step_7: Click on this button to delete event
tour.step_8: Press this button and drag the event to reorder
tour.can_review: You can go to the settings page to review tour
tour.learn_more: Learn more about how to use
